overview: I've always wanted to share my experiences and give a little glimpse of me to my fans. Now it's my time to finally do it! Inside you'll find over 3 hours of action I shot just for my fans. There's something for everybody. Even my friend Bree Olson stops by! So sit back, tune in, strip off, and enjoy The Cassandra Calogera Experience!
tagline: I've always wanted to share my experiences and give a little glimpse of me to my fans. Now it's my time to finally do it!
title: The Cassandra Calogera Experience
